data.actual_result: It gives you an invalid Discord link, and the format is {channelid}/{messageid}
data.expected_result: It's supposed to give you a link to the image like it used to
data.short_description: Rich embed thumbnail images does not point to the image link anymore, instead it points to an invalid Discord link when right clicking then clicking copy link
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a bot to post a rich embed that has a thumbnail image (top right corner) - Right click then copy link - Observe the link
